content: Hello everyone. This project has been canceled due to project team members. Thanks everyone.

comments.author: BITCOIN4X
comments.body: Quote from: usekevin on March 06, 2023, 05:51:02 PMYou had not mentioned about payment of each rank separately.Kindly update about the Escrow too.And if participants are not paid in bitcoin, then OP just needs to continue this campaign in the bounty board.

comments.author: MFahad
comments.body: Wrong Place. Token will be distributed to Bsc networkPlease move your topic to Altcoins Bounty section

comments.author: Sakanwa
comments.body: Welcome on board and it seems you guys are not in bitcoin  or usd so I will advice that if your platform is legit then you should try engaging more of member  rank as they will be glad to help promote  your  brand. Goodluck.

comments.author: Rigon
comments.body: Quote from: BITCOIN4X on March 06, 2023, 05:56:46 PMQuote from: usekevin on March 06, 2023, 05:51:02 PMYou had not mentioned about payment of each rank separately.Kindly update about the Escrow too.And if participants are not paid in bitcoin, then OP just needs to continue this campaign in the bounty board.Right, Well, here I noticed that campaign manager won't pay bitcoins. But campaign manager may not know that this service section is not for managing campaign with Token/USDT/BUSD. But if you run a campaign with tokens, you must put it in the bounty section. I hope the manager understands.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: BITCOIN4X on March 06, 2023, 05:56:46 PMAnd if participants are not paid in bitcoin, then OP just needs to continue this campaign in the bounty board.Quote from: MFahad on March 06, 2023, 06:04:08 PMWrong Place. Token will be distributed to Bsc networkPlease move your topic to Altcoins Bounty section Quote from: usekevin on March 06, 2023, 06:27:12 PMQuote from: MFahad on March 06, 2023, 06:04:08 PMWrong Place. Token will be distributed to Bsc networkPlease move your topic to Altcoins Bounty section Manager should move the thread to bounty section, Since the payment on tokens. From what I understand is just for the OP to update his payment rate for each Rank, which he has already done it. And I also believe the payment is for bitcoin since he mentioned [BSC address:] on the application format. BSC is bitcoin address. Op is new to the forum so instead of telling him to move the campaign to Bounty why can you ask him which campaign it is, then you tell what next. I hope he is also learning.

comments.body: 420 quadrillion total supply. Even I am surprised...

comments.body: Quote from: SakanwaWelcome on board and it seems you guys are not in bitcoin  or usd so I will advice that if your platform is legit then you should try engaging more of member  rank as they will be glad to help promote  your  brand. Goodluck.You're right mate, member rank know how to spread information that will help the company to achieve what they want on time, I wish you all good luck.

comments.author: JoyMarsha
comments.body: Quote from: Sakanwa on March 06, 2023, 06:07:11 PMWelcome on board and it seems you guys are not in bitcoin  or usd so I will advice that if your platform is legit then you should try engaging more of member  rank as they will be glad to help promote  your  brand. Goodluck.A token payments campaigns like this are supposed to post on an altcoin bounty thread, not on the service board thread. The OP has to be aware of that than asking for a chance to join. Engage as a member rank so that you can have the opportunity to participate in the campaign right? If you are looking for campaigns to promote as a member rank, go through the altcoin bounty thread to find yourself one to partake(promote) in. For your notice, not all altcoin bounties you promoted will pay you well as a member rank due to the number of participants involved in the campaign. Do yourself good by focusing on building your account to a higher rank of full member and above. That's when you will have the joy of promoting bounty campaigns.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: There were members that have already suggested about moving the thread to the right section and there's no need to repeat it again guys. @OP is the token tradable somewhere? I can't find more details about it listed on some exchanges. It's not yet on cmc/cg too.

comments.body: I'm a bit confused about the rules for this campaign where this project is an altcoin but in the rules it is mandatory to post it on the gambling board while the altcoin discussion board doesn't count? It's like copying the rules from the Royse777 campaign  Quote from: jossiel on March 06, 2023, 09:03:56 PM@OP is the token tradable somewhere? I can't find more details about it listed on some exchanges. It's not yet on cmc/cg too.This token is still on sale at PinkSale.Softcap of this project is 5 BNB.
